hero.title: Accelerating the Energy Transition
hero.intro: We connect renewable energy producers with digital asset investors within a secure and regulated framework.

compliance.title: Trust & Compliance
compliance.regulation: Issuances compliant with the AMF Prospectus Regulation, restricted to qualified investors
compliance.custody: Securities and cash flows safeguarded by Crédit Mutuel, a licensed financial institution
compliance.security: Transparency and security ensured by our smart contracts, deployed on public blockchains

structuration.title: Bond Structuring
structuration.description: We design tailored bond instruments that meet the financing needs of renewable energy producers.

tokenization.title: Tokenized Bond Issuance
tokenization.description: We tokenize our bonds to make them accessible to institutional investors and digital asset funds.

distribution.title: Investor Distribution
distribution.description: We ensure the distribution of tokenized bonds to qualified investors.

regulation.title: Regulatory Security
regulation.description: All our operations are fully compliant with AMF standards, supported by robust KYC/AML processes and regulated asset custody.

yield.title: Stable Returns
yield.description: Bonds backed by real assets, offering structured yields (>6%) with lower volatility compared to traditional digital assets.

impact.title: Positive Environmental Impact
impact.description: Each investment directly contributes to the development of new local solar and wind power capacities.

innovation.title: Technological Innovation
innovation.description: A digital platform that streamlines issuance, management, and monitoring of bonds, enhancing transparency for all stakeholders.

hero.title: Producers of Renewable Energy
hero.intro: We structure and tokenize your bonds to accelerate the financing of your projects.

needs.title: Your Financing Needs
needs.description:
Developing a renewable energy project often requires more than bank debt alone.
Between equity requirements and lengthy procedures, a funding gap frequently remains.
We address this complementary need with a flexible, fast, and tailored approach to your projects.

structured.title: Structured Bonds
structured.description: We design a bond instrument tailored to your project, providing an effective alternative to equity fundraising.

digitalization.title: Tokenized Bonds & Distribution
digitalization.description: We tokenize these bonds to facilitate their distribution among investors specialized in digital assets and sustainable finance.

support.title: Comprehensive Support
support.description: From legal structuring to investor outreach, we guide you throughout the entire financing process.

capital.title: Broader Access to Complementary Capital
capital.description: A complementary financing solution that broadens your sources of capital and secures project delivery — without diluting your governance.

fees.title: Reduced Costs
fees.description: Optimized structuring and transaction costs, significantly below market standards, to maximize the financial efficiency of your fundraising.

esg.title: ESG & Regulatory Framework
esg.description: An integrated solution fully compliant with AMF requirements, with bond custody ensured by a regulated depositary bank, and strict alignment with ESG standards and best practices in sustainable finance.

speed.title: Speed & Transparency
speed.description: A simplified and digitalized process enabling real-time monitoring and clear reporting, ensuring speed, visibility, and trust for all stakeholders.

hero.title: Real, regulated digital bonds for your digital asset portfolios.
hero.intro: We provide digital asset funds with stable, compliant financial instruments that deliver positive impact.

context.title: Context & Opportunity
context.paragraph1: The digital asset market has grown rapidly but remains dominated by volatile instruments (cryptocurrencies) or low-yield products (stablecoins).
context.paragraph2: Investors are now seeking digital assets backed by real-world assets, combining security, yield, and ESG alignment.
context.paragraph3: rebond addresses this demand by digitalizing bonds issued by renewable energy producers.

digitalBonds.title: Digitalized Bonds
digitalBonds.description: Financial instruments issued and managed on blockchain, backed by real projects and offering a contractual yield above 6%, with full transparency and traceability.

underlying.title: Tangible Underlying
underlying.description: Each bond directly finances solar or wind power plants, making a measurable contribution to the energy transition.

distribution.title: Secure Distribution
distribution.description: Investment reserved for qualified actors, with custody ensured by a regulated depositary bank and strict compliance procedures (KYC/AML).

regulatory.title: Regulatory Security
regulatory.description: AMF framework, MiFID II compliance and integrated KYC/AML processes, ensuring end-to-end regulatory alignment.

impact.title: Measurable Impact
impact.description: Each euro invested translates into installed MW capacity and avoided CO₂ emissions, with impact indicators tracked over time.

yield.title: Attractive Yield
yield.description: Target yield above 6% per year, contractually defined and uncorrelated with crypto market volatility.

innovation.title: Digital Innovation
innovation.description: On-chain issuance and lifecycle management, full audit trail, enhanced reporting and visibility for all stakeholders.

cta.title: Combine performance, security, and sustainability in your digital investments.
cta.subtitle: Let’s discuss your needs, compliance requirements, and investment horizon.

hero.title: Compliance & Security
hero.intro:
Trust is at the heart of every transaction.
rebond builds on a clear legal framework, licensed partners and strict procedures to safeguard both investors and issuers.

regulation.title: Regulatory framework
regulation.prospectus:
Transactions governed by:
EU Prospectus Regulation (AMF)
regulation.qualified:
Qualified investors only
* KYC / AML procedures
regulation.risk:
Risk disclosure
* Markets in Financial Instruments Directive (MiFID II)

customerSecurity.title: Investor Security
customerSecurity.custody: Custody of securities and financial flows ensured by Crédit Mutuel, a licensed financial institution
customerSecurity.traceability: Transparency and security guaranteed by our smart contracts, deployed on public blockchains
customerSecurity.tokenization: Secure digitalization through regular technical audits performed by specialized firms

study.title: Due diligence
study.description: Technical, financial and regulatory audits of financed projects

custody.title: Collateral & custody
custody.description: Issued securities locked and secured with a regulated custodian

impact.title: Impact monitoring
impact.description: ESG reporting aligned with international best practices

advisory.title: An independent advisory board
advisory.description: Gathering experts in financial regulation, renewable energy and blockchain

transparency.title: Transparency & Accountability
transparency.disclaimer: Target returns are not guaranteed. Every investment carries a risk of capital loss and limited liquidity
transparency.restricted: Securities are strictly limited to qualified investors; no public offering is made
transparency.reporting: rebond commits to publishing regular financial and extra-financial reports, including ESG impact tracking

footer.disclaimer:
The information presented on this website does not constitute a public offering. Financial instruments distributed by rebond are reserved for qualified investors within the meaning of the MiFID II directive. Each operation is conducted in compliance with the Prospectus Regulation (EU) 2017/1129 and AMF requirements.
Investing in bonds involves a risk of partial or total loss of the capital invested. Please refer to the compliance page for more information.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: Have a question about our solutions? An investment project? Our team is available to support you.

email.title: Send us a message
email.description: Drop us a line, we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

address.title: Our address
address.description: Visit us at our offices in Bordeaux.
address.name: Rebond SAS

additional.title: Are you an investor?
additional.description: For any information request about our tokenized renewable energy bonds, feel free to contact us. We'll explore together the investment opportunities that match your profile.

director.title: Publication Director
director.content: The publication director is the legal representative of Rebond SAS.

hosting.title: Website Hosting
hosting.content: The rebond.eco website is hosted by:
hosting.address: GitHub, Inc. - 88 Colin P Kelly Jr St, San Francisco, CA 94107, United States

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content1: All content on this website (texts, images, logos, graphics, etc.) is protected by copyright and belongs to Rebond SAS or its partners.
intellectual.content2: Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, adaptation of all or part of the site elements, regardless of the means or process used, is prohibited without prior written authorization.

data.title: Personal Data
data.content1: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to access, rectify, erase and port your personal data.
data.content2: Data collected via the contact form and newsletter are used only for our commercial activities and are not transmitted to third parties.
data.content3: To exercise your rights or for any questions regarding the processing of your personal data, you can contact us at: bonjour{'@'}rebond.eco

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content1: This website does not use any cookies. We have chosen not to implement any cookie system to maximize respect for your privacy.
cookies.content2: No browsing data is stored on your device when you visit our site.

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: Rebond SAS strives to provide accurate and up-to-date information, but cannot guarantee the accuracy, precision or completeness of the information made available on this site. The use of this information is at the sole responsibility of the user.

law.title: Applicable Law
law.content: These legal notices are subject to French law. In case of dispute, French courts shall have sole jurisdiction.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to follow our news and updates.
